TitlePage.Abstract: &LAGUNA; is a share package for &GAP;~4, which is capable of computing with group algebras of finite p-groups over the field of p elements. Besides computing some general properties and attributes, the &LAGUNA; share package is able to carry out two main kinds of computations. Namely, it is capable of computing the structure of the normalised unit group, and it is capable of verifying whether some Lie property holds in such a group algebra. &LAGUNA; written in the &GAP;~4 computer algebra system, and it runs within the same system.
